body.name: Oxford Baby Lazio 4-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib, Snow White, GreenGuard Gold Certified
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, March 4. Order within 16 hrs 55 mins
features: SAFETY FIRST: Oxford Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards
EXQUISITE STYLING: The Lazio Crib features simple clean lines, a flat, full panel straight-line headboard with beautifully refined vertical finishing detail, and a smooth to the touch surface

SUPERIOR QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

THOUGHTFUL DESIGN: Designed to fit a standard-size crib mattress, this 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient design that will grow as your baby grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed and full-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: GreenGuard Gold Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage
EASY TO FIND CONVERSION KITS: Toddler Bed Guard Rail (11795420) and Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit (11788420), sold separately

COMPLETE NURSERY COLLECTION: The Lazio Collection features a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (17711420), 3-Drawer Dresser (22333420), 6-Drawer Dresser (22336420), Changing Topper (22265420), Changing Station (67068420), and Crib Mattress, sold separately

ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: Measuring 54.75 in. W x 29.63 in. D x 39.50 in. H (50.60 lbs.), this full-size Oxford Baby Crib arrives ready to assemble and includes hardware for assembly; screwdriver not included but required to assemble
WEIGHT CAPACITY: 50 pound weight capacity when used as a crib, toddler bed, or day bed; 400 pound weight capacity when converted to a full-size bed
FINISHING DETAILS: The Lazio Collection by Oxford Baby is available in Dove Gray, Snow White, and Espresso Brown finishes
body.description: The Lazio Collection features bold styling and elegant detail while exemplifying highest quality and safety standards. This gorgeous baby furniture collection is constructed from the finest solid woods and veneers which highlight its signature design. Oxford Baby's innovative 4-in-1 design of the Lazio Convertible Crib has a beautiful wainscoting headboard. The Lazio Crib is sturdy and easily converts the Crib to a Toddler Bed, to a Daybed and then to a Full Size Bed. Toddler Guard Rail and the full-size bed Conversion Kit are sold separately. Designed with your baby's safety in mind, the crib meets all safety guidelines. The mattress is not included. The Lazio Collection by Oxford Baby features: 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, Changing Station & Changing Pad, Toddler Bed Guard Rail, and Full Bed Conversion Kit. All collection pieces are sold individually. The Lazio Collection is available in three exclusive finishes: Dove Gray, Espresso, and Snow White.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Greenguard Gold Certified Tested for over 10,000 chemicals and VOC's, ensuring that your little one is sleeping in a safe and healthy environment. 3 Adjustable Height Settings Thoughtfully designed to lower as your baby crawls, sits, and stands. The mattress support will lower to accommodate your child's growing needs. Superior Construction Oxford Baby cribs are made from the finest materials for durability, and sourced from sustainable forests.

Lazio Crib The Lazio 4-in-1 Convertible Crib grows with your child over time for long-lasting value. Lazio Toddler Bed The Lazio 4-in-1 Convertible Crib adapts into a grand toddler bed; this stage teaches your child to get in and out of bed on their own. Toddler Guard Rail sold separately. Lazio Day Bed For added versatility, the Lazio 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a day bed. Lazio Full Size Bed The Lazio 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a spacious full size bed for your little one. Full Bed Conversion Kit sold separately.
Lazio Guard Rail Lazio Full Bed Conversion Kit Lazio 3 Drawer Dresser Lazio Changing Topper Lazio Changing Station Available on Amazon ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build, sturdy and ready to grow with your child
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, put together pretty easily, and we bought the additional part to switch it to a toddler day bed as well for my niece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scratch on the crib that is very visible
reviews.reviewText: Crib has a scratch on it that is very visible. I would like to get in contact with the seller to see if I can get some money back or a replacement at no charge.Other than the scratch the crib is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE BEST TODDLER BED.
reviews.reviewText: I've bought and returned 3 toddler beds because they weren't good quality and/or my daughter wouldn't like it. But this one? Amazing. It is good quality and spacious. SO SPACIOUS. I would recommend two people for the assembly part and to really pay attention to the instructions, but other than that? Had no problem with it. Will definitely buy a second one for my other child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a great buy
reviews.reviewText: We didn’t open this for about a month. Ordered white but received dove gray. Too late to return and disappointed but not a show stopper. The crib was easy to assemble. Standard crib mattress fits nice and snug.It isn’t used for naps or even every night. Baby is not left in crib for extended period of time. I’d say on average, this is a lightly used crib. Our baby has 4 teeth and in a matter of a couple of weeks we started seeing scratches - even when he only had two teeth. In just a few short months, it looks like in the photo. The rail is full of ugly scratches. Completely disappointing purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and easy
reviews.reviewText: Easiest crib I’ve ever set up. The color is beautiful and it is very sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Read the instructions carefully
reviews.reviewText: The build quality is good, but read ahead a few steps and watch the diagrams closely as they have a couple of pieces backwards in the drawings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Crib was easy to put together and looks really nice.”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4-1 way to go
reviews.reviewText: New g-grandbaby is due in Nov. She will grow into the bed as it will change with her. All white needs some girlie decals lol.
